sourcesContent:
import Vue from 'vue'
import Router from 'vue-router'
import HelloContainer from "./components/HelloWorld.vue"
import exam01 from "./components/exam01.vue" //导入自定义组件，exam01为新起的名字
import banner from "./components/banner.vue"
import Mint from '../node_modules/mint-ui'
import list from "./components/list.vue"
import header from "./components/header.vue"
import Login from "./components/tabbar/Login.vue"
import productList from "./components/home/productList"
import Exam03 from "./components/tabbar/exam03"
import exam4 from "./components/tabbar/exam4"
import exam5 from "./components/exam5"
import exam6 from "./components/exam6"
import newList from "./components/tabbar/newList"
import home from "./components/tabbar/Home.vue"
import shopcart from "./components/tabbar/shopcart"
Vue.use(Mint);
Vue.use(Router)
//启动脚手架npm run dev 看package.json
//地址栏访问脚手架 127.0.0.1:8080看package.json
export default new Router({
  routes: [
    {path:'/',component:HelloContainer},
    {path:'/exam01',component:exam01},//为组件配置访问路径
    {path:'/banner',component:banner},
    {path:"/list",component:list},
    {path:"/header",component:header},
    {path:"/login",component:Login},
    {path:"/productList",component:productList},
    {path:"/exam03",component:Exam03},
    {path:"/exam4",component:exam4},
    {path:"/exam5",component:exam5},
    {path:"/exam6",component:exam6},
    {path:"/newList",component:newList},
    {path:"/home",component:home},
    {path:"/shopcart",component:shopcart}
  ]
})
//npm run serve 启动脚手架
